title: Please take off this low priority queue
body: I was in a game, just finished serving a 5 game penalty, and right at the beginning my computer says "OOPS there was a problem we gotta restart your computer!!" and i was pissed yknow. So i COME BACK AND FINISH THE GAME, and was given low priority AGAIN. why do i have this low priority??? This was completely out of my control and it isn't fair please help me for once instead of telling me to go screw myself?

replies.body: That sucks.  :(  Your account will continue to accrue [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties until it's able to play consistently without leaves.  You'll want to stick to customs for now and work on resolving the cause, otherwise it can continue escalating.  If you want to give me more specific on the cause, I can try and help!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mfWJw3d1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-25T22:34:23.703+0000)
>
> That sucks.  :(  Your account will continue to accrue [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties until it's able to play consistently without leaves.  You'll want to stick to customs for now and work on resolving the cause, otherwise it can continue escalating.  If you want to give me more specific on the cause, I can try and help!

Yeah unfortunately I'm in a similar situation. According to the leavebuster faq though, riot will not remove leavebuster for anyone as this will conflict with what the system was setup for. So yeah pretty much what @Porocles said above, I'd try to get all your kinks worked out prior to playing.
Why the fuck does this board exist when riot doesnt help anyone. Assholes
